text: The 2015 Aviva Tour of Britain was an eight-stage men's professional road cycling race. It was the twelfth running of the 2004 incarnation of the Tour of Britain and the 76th British tour in total. The race started on 6 September in Beaumaris and finished on 13 September in London. The race was part of the 2015 UCI Europe Tour. ==Teams== The twenty teams invited to participate in the Tour of Britain are: {| | style="vertical-align:top; width:25%;"| UCI ProTeams * * * * * * * * * | style="vertical-align:top; width:25%;"| UCI Professional Continental Teams * * * | style="vertical-align:top; width:25%;"| UCI Continental Teams * * * * * * * | style="vertical-align:top; width:25%;"| National Teams * Great Britain |} ==Stages== {| class="wikitable" |+List of stages |- !Stage !Date !Course !Distance !colspan="2"|Type !Winner !Ref |- !style="text-align:left"|1 |align=right|6 September || Beaumaris – Wrexham || style="text-align:center;"| || link= || Hilly stage || || |- !style="text- align:left"|2 |align=right|7 September || Clitheroe – Colne || style="text- align:center;"| || link= || Hilly stage || || |- !style="text-align:left"|3 |align=right|8 September || Cockermouth – Floors Castle || style="text- align:center;"| || link= || Flat stage || || |- !style="text-align:left"|4 |align=right|9 September || Edinburgh – Blyth || style="text-align:center;"| || link= || Flat stage || || |- !style="text-align:left"|5 |align=right|10 September || Prudhoe – Hartside Fell, Cumbria || style="text-align:center;"| || link= || Medium-mountain stage || || |- !style="text-align:left"|6 |align=right|11 September || Stoke-on-Trent – Nottingham || style="text- align:center;"| || link= || Hilly stage || || |- !style="text-align:left"|7 |align=right|12 September || Fakenham – Ipswich || style="text-align:center;"| || link= || Flat stage || || |- !style="text-align:left"|8 |align=right|13 September || London || style="text-align:center;"| || link= || Flat stage || || |} ===Stage 1=== 6 September 2015 — Beaumaris to Wrexham, {| |Stage 1 Result {| class="wikitable" !
